Work

Projects

  • acts_as_optionable – my foray into ruby plugins. Adds variable options polymorphically onto ActiveRecord models.
  • spec_run_queue – Use a queue in redis to run specs outside your editor.
  • can-opener – Split up your CanCan Ability.

Contributions

  • rack-throttle – Rack middleware for rate-limiting HTTP requests
  • cuba-sugar – Give cuba some sugar!
